name: Light'Em Up (Vraj95Soni)
description:
Clay suffers from a rare disease that makes him feel that he has a new disease everyday. Today, he feels that he has lost his vision but apparently the lights are off in his city. Help Clay collect those lights and get his eyesight back, but make sure you don't fall into the traps along the way. 

We have Spikes , Willans(Obviously a Pun on Villain) and also falling meteors(Yup you read it right 'Falling Meteors'). But where there is way there is light, and hence Clay has his packet of lights with limited fuel and range filled up in his pockets, use them wisely to make his life/journey easier.

Happy Gaming!!!!!!!!
